outputs.output_descr: In selected ethnic minority areas, the project applies a comprehensive approach that will: 1) help to strengthen leadership; 2) support working capacity from county to community level; 3) develop supportive institutional structure.
Partnership Initiative with Jala Group to support sustainable cultural industries development for livelihoods improvement of ethnic minorities

project_descr: Poverty reduction for Ethnic Minorities in Chinia through promotion of culture based traditions
project_title: Poverty reduction for Ethnic Minorities in Chinia
